<small>Hebrew form: [[H7679]]</small>
 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׂגָא‎</span>] **verb** ==grow great== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ס‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; see Biblical Hebrew <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שׂגא‎</span> (Aramaism in Job); — 

**Pe\`al** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎יִשְׂגֵּא‎</span>, of injury [[Ezra.4.22|Ezra 4:22]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁלָֽמְכוֺןיִשְׂ‎</span> [[Dan.3.31|Dan 3:31]]; [[Dan.6.26|Dan 6:26]].
